caption.title: Global NBP during the 21 st century.
caption.p: The evolution of total global NBP ( NBP ( LAND) ), along with changes in NBP that can be attributed to soil moisture variability ( NBP ( SMVAR) ) and a soil moisture trend ( NBP ( SMTREND) ) through the 21 st century. The shaded areas in the figure inset shows the spread of the four model results for each of the NBP components.
